nodes.documentation:
@dev This contract will distribute tokens to the buyers who purchase items from
the OB verified sellers
For more information please visit below mentioned link
https://github.com/OB1Company/openbazaar-smart-contracts/issues/10
nodes.name: OBRewards

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Maximum reward must be greater than 0"

arguments.value: Maximum reward must be greater than 0

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Maximum reward must be greater than 0"

arguments.value: Time window must be greater than 0

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Time window must be greater than 0"

arguments.value: One of the sellers is already promoted

nodes.documentation:
@dev Remove exisiting promoted sellers
@param sellers List of sellers to be removed
nodes.name: removePromotedSellers
getRewardedBuyers

typeDescriptions.typeString: mapping(address => mapping(address => struct OBRewards.Reward storage ref))

nodes.name: getBuyerRewardInfo
getDistributedReward
transferRemainingTokens

nodes.documentation:
@dev Method to allow the onwer to adjust the maximum reward per seller
@param _maxRewardPerSeller Max reward to be distributed for each seller
nodes.name: changeMaxRewardPerSeller

nodes.documentation:
@dev Method to allow the owner to change the timeWindow variable
@param _timeWindow A time window in seconds
nodes.name: changeTimeWindow

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns the number of rewarded buyers associated with a given seller
@param seller Address of the promoted seller
nodes.name: noOfRewardedBuyers
getRewardedBuyer

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the owner of the contract to turn on the rewards distribution
Only if it was not previously turned on
nodes.name: turnOnRewards

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "End date should be greater than current date"

arguments.value: End date should be greater than current date

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "End date should be greater than current date"

nodes.documentation:
@dev ALlows owner to set date
@param _endDate End date of rewards
nodes.name: setEndDate
calculateReward

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint8[] memory,bytes32[] memory,bytes32[] memory,bytes32,address[] memory,uint256[] memory) external

nodes.documentation:
@dev Using this method user can choose to execute their transaction and
claim their rewards in one go. This will save one transaction.
Users can only use this method if their trade is using escrowContract
for escrow.
See the execute() method Escrow_v1_0.sol for more information.
nodes.name: executeAndClaim

typeDescriptions.typeString: mapping(address => mapping(address => struct OBRewards.Reward storage ref))

nodes.documentation:
@dev Function to claim tokens
@param scriptHashes Array of scriptHashes of OB trades for which
the buyer wants to claim reward tokens.
Note that a Buyer can perform trades with multiple promoted sellers and
then can claim their reward tokens all at once for all those trades using
this function.
Be mindful of the block gas limit (do not pass too many scripthashes).
nodes.name: claimRewards

nodes.documentation:
@dev Private helper function to claim reward for a single scriptHash
@dev scriptHash Script hash of the transaction
nodes.name: _claimReward
_verifyTransactionData
_getTokensToReward

typeDescriptions.typeString: mapping(address => mapping(address => struct OBRewards.Reward storage ref))

nodes.name: _calculateReward
